briefdescription.para: Cycle counter indices used internally in the domain decomposition.
Returns the global topology atom number belonging to local atom index i.

detaileddescription.para: This function is intended for writing ASCII output and returns atom numbers starting at 1. When dd=NULL returns i+1.

briefdescription.para: Return a block struct for the charge groups of the whole system.
Store the global cg indices of the home cgs in state,.

detaileddescription.para: This means it can be reset, even after a new DD partitioning.

briefdescription.para: Returns a pointer to the gmx_domdec_zones_t struct.

memberdef.argsstring: (const gmx_domdec_t *dd, int icg, int *jcg0, int *jcg1, ivec shift0, ivec shift1)
memberdef.name: dd_get_ns_ranges

briefdescription.para: Sets the j-charge-group range for i-charge-group icg.
Returns the atom range in the local state for atoms involved in virtual sites.
Sets the atom range for atom in the local state for atoms received in constraints communication.
Get the number of PME nodes along x and y, can be called with dd=NULL.

memberdef.argsstring: (struct t_commrec *cr, int pmenodeid, int *nmy_ddnodes, int **my_ddnodes, int *node_peer)

briefdescription.para: Returns the set of DD nodes that communicate with pme node cr->nodeid.
Returns the maximum shift for coordinate communication in PME, dim x.
Returns the maximum shift for coordinate communication in PME, dim y.

memberdef.name: dd_init_bondeds

briefdescription.para: Initialize data structures for bonded interactions.
Returns if we need to do pbc for calculating bonded interactions.

memberdef.argsstring: (struct t_commrec *cr, t_state *state, const t_inputrec *ir, real cutoff_req)
memberdef.name: change_dd_cutoff

briefdescription.para: Change the DD non-bonded communication cut-off.

detaileddescription.para: This could fail when trying to increase the cut-off, then FALSE will be returned and the cut-off is not modified.

briefdescription.para: Limit DLB to preserve the option of returning to the current cut-off.

detaileddescription.para: Domain boundary changes due to the DD dynamic load balancing can limit the cut-off distance that can be set in change_dd_cutoff. This function sets/changes the DLB limit such that using the passed (pair-list) cut-off should still be possible after subsequently setting a shorter cut-off with change_dd_cutoff.

briefdescription.para: Return if we are currently using dynamic load balancing.
Return if the DLB lock is set.
Set a lock such that with DLB=auto DLB cannot get turned on.
Clear a lock such that with DLB=auto DLB may get turned on later.
Set up communication for averaging GPU wait times over ranks.

detaileddescription.para: When domains (PP MPI ranks) share a GPU, the individual GPU wait times are meaningless, as it depends on the order in which tasks on the same GPU finish. Therefore there wait times need to be averaged over the ranks sharing the same GPU. This function sets up the communication for that.

briefdescription.para: Collects local rvec arrays lv to v on the master rank.
Collects the local state state_local to state on the master rank.
Add the wallcycle count to the DD counter.
Start the force flop count.
Stop the force flop count.
Return the PME/PP force load ratio, or -1 if nothing was measured.

detaileddescription.para: Should only be called on the DD master node.

briefdescription.para: Communicate the coordinates to the neighboring cells and do pbc.
Sum the forces over the neighboring cells.

detaileddescription.para: When fshift!=NULL the shift forces are updated to obtain the correct virial from the single sum including f.

briefdescription.para: Communicate a real for each atom to the neighboring cells.
Sum the contributions to a real for each atom over the neighboring cells.

memberdef.argsstring: (FILE *fplog, gmx_int64_t step, t_commrec *cr, gmx_bool bMasterState, int nstglobalcomm, t_state *state_global, const gmx_mtop_t *top_global, const t_inputrec *ir, t_state *state_local, rvec **f, t_mdatoms *mdatoms, gmx_localtop_t *top_local, t_forcerec *fr, gmx_vsite_t *vsite, gmx_constr_t constr, t_nrnb *nrnb, gmx_wallcycle_t wcycle, gmx_bool bVerbose)
memberdef.name: dd_partition_system

briefdescription.para: Partition the system over the nodes.

detaileddescription.para: step is only used for printing error messages. If bMasterState==TRUE then state_global from the master node is used, else state_local is redistributed between the nodes. When f!=NULL, *f will be reallocated to the size of state_local.

briefdescription.para: Reset all the statistics and counters for total run counting.
Print statistics for domain decomposition communication.
Communicates the virtual site forces, reduces the shift forces when fshift != NULL.
Clears the forces for virtual sites.

memberdef.argsstring: (struct gmx_domdec_t *dd, matrix box, rvec *x0, rvec *x1, gmx_bool bX1IsCoord)
memberdef.name: dd_move_x_constraints

briefdescription.para: Move x0 and also x1 if x1!=NULL. bX1IsCoord tells if to do PBC on x1.
Communicates the coordinates involved in virtual sites.
Returns the local atom count array for all constraints.

detaileddescription.para: The local atom count for a constraint, possible values 2/1/0, is needed to avoid not/double-counting contributions linked to the Lagrange multiplier, such as the virial and free-energy derivatives.

memberdef.argsstring: (FILE *fplog, struct t_commrec *cr, int local_count, const gmx_mtop_t *top_global, const gmx_localtop_t *top_local, t_state *state_local)

This file declares functions for mdrun to call to manage the details of its domain decomposition.
